EmailTemplate.name: 17.Radio.AirScale.AirScal.L.G.N.17206.AirScale 2017.Email 3 - AirScale
EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud RAN: satisfy any demand, anytime, anywhere
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Satisfy any demand, anytime, anywhere Cloud RAN: React instantly to meet new demands Cloud-based RAN flexibility lets you meet any demand, wherever it arises, even over great distances. AirScale Cloud RAN is proven to deliver high bandwidth and low latency to boost your business, as Korea’s SK Telecom found to its benefit. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
